mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ASS_Change_SOURCE_Other (
group_id ,
hos_id ,
copy_code ,
change_no ,
ass_card_no ,
source_id ,
old_price ,
change_price ,
price ,
note ,
) VALUES (
#{group_id} ,
#{hos_id} ,
#{copy_code} ,
#{change_no} ,
#{ass_card_no} ,
#{source_id} ,
#{old_price} ,
#{change_price} ,
#{price} ,
#{note}
)
mapper.select:
SELECT a.group_id, a.hos_id, a.copy_code, a.change_no, a.ass_card_no, a.source_id, b.source_code||' '||b.source_name source_name, a.old_price, a.change_price, a.price, a.note FROM ASS_Change_SOURCE_Other a left join hos_source b on a.group_id = b.group_id and a.hos_id = b.hos_id and a.source_id = b.source_id
AND a.group_id = #{group_id} AND a.hos_id = #{hos_id} AND a.copy_code = #{copy_code} AND a.change_no = #{change_no} AND a.ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no}

SELECT group_id, hos_id, copy_code, change_no, ass_card_no, source_id, old_price, change_price, price, note FROM ass_change_source_Other WHERE group_id = #{group_id} and hos_id = #{hos_id} and copy_code = #{copy_code} and change_no = #{change_no} and ass_card_no = #{ass_card_no} and source_id = #{source_id}
